Идея игры - шикарна. Играть с друзьями и страшно и весело.
Но реализация на низком уровне. И дело даже не в багах и сырости, а в том что она пустая.
Персонажи нераскрыты, а их прокачка как "пальцем в небо" - мало того, что непонятна, так еще и на 90% бесполезная.
Сами же карты для выживания ненаполнены практически ничем, кроме стенок, генераторов и крюков в абсолютно бесвкусном виде. По сути нет никакой разницы на какой карте играть. Интерес к игре пропадает примерно на 5-6 часу.

Жаль - что просрали такую идею на миллион.

В стадии Beta-теста в Dead By Daylight было интересно играть, игра приносила новые ощущения и эмоции. Можно было закрыть глаза на все баги, кривую анимацию и прочие огрехи. Прошло уже много времени с релиза, некоторые проблемы остались, а к ним добавились новые, но вместо того чтобы править баланс, баги и бороться с читерами, разработчики закидывают игру платными DLC с одеждой, новыми выжившими, маньяками и картами, которые даже не меняют геймплей.

My feelings about the game are between mixed and love it. The concept is amazing, levels are reasonably well made, graphically I have nothing to complain about. I played for free this weekend for a good several hours as I've been sceptical due to a large number of negative reviews, played about 20ish matches both as survivor and killer.

My overall opinion is that its definitely worth a purchase on any kind of sale, otherwise spend a bit more time looking at videos and/or wait until you get a chance to play for free on a f2p weekend or this weekend if there is still time before committing as the cons I list before could be enough for some people to be put off.

Positive:
- Simple but brilliant concept.
- Reasonably nice levels.
- No-fuss game easy to get into game play
- Satisfying and intense game play at times

Negatives:
- Unfortunately balance can seem a fair bit off for newer players
- Sometimes can be greeted with people trying to exploit the system for exp (Joined a lobby where a guy was a killer and he invited 2 friends, they sat damaging and healing each other all game to grind exp spoiling the game for the rest of us)
- Could do with more maps
- Unfortunately its buggy at times
- Lacks a settings menu, even for basic options like VSync. (There is a work around I believe but this is standard stuff that should be in a settings menu)
- Plenty of game breaking bugs and frustrations.

My recommendation:
Don't play this game expectations of levelling or as if its some sort of competitive game. It's not, go in with a frustration free, open mind and to play for fun. Don't come in expecting to grind EXP so you can get all of the perks and never lose, just play the game and deal with the issues that are there and you'll have a far more enjoyable experience.

This is why I personally suggest its not for everyone, if you're a very nit-picky person who cannot get over the minor issues this game will frustrate you. If you're a person who cannot deal with unfair games, this is also not a game for you, though there is 'balance' the game is heavily bias most of the time to the killer, but that is intentional, you will still receive exp for playing regardless and you don't have to win to have fun. Sometimes, its odd moments where you pull yourself miraculously off the killers hooks yourself and escape that are more satisfying than just simply doing the objectives and winning.

I really REALLY want this game to succeed. Its a great premise and when it works, its fun. But therein lies the problem. There are definitely some connectivity issues, in addition to the game locking up in a load screen or in the main menu itself.. The other reviews that say it takes a long time to successfully find a match are not misleading. It does. It is not uncommon to see 4+ people leave your match after they get tired of waiting.

When I do get in to a game, its not terribly balanced to new players. I'll be a rank 1 Survivor up against what feels to me like a CoD 10th Prestige killer who has all Ultra Rare Perks. How can a new player compete with that?

But that's all negative. If you're really reading this review in order to help your thoughts on the game, here's the good stuff.

The game is incredibly polished. It looks beautiful, it sounds beautiful (Which is GREAT given that audio cues are pivotal in this). The killers are different, rather than reskins of the same basic thing. They each have their own little niche and learning curve that they fall in to. It really builds a good replayable base for the game to develop from. Survivors, though few, are pretty decently customizable and you can get some good diversity between characters between the four of you.

I'll finish this up with a quick summary.

PROS:
- Beautiful graphics
- Beautiful sound design
-Unique and Interesting Killers
-A Multitude of Survivors to choose from and customize
-A decently robust leveling system for both Killer and Survivor
-Pretty decent update schedule thus far

CONS:
-Connectivity Issues
-Lock-up Issues
-Poor Matchmaking

Overall, I'm not yet disappointed with my purchase. Issues can be fixed and the game is still young and growing. There is time yet for it to become even better.

One of, if not THE, most incredibly frustrating game experiences I have ever had. I want to love this game SO SO SO much, and there's so much right about this game. Unfortunately, the devs just can't seem to get out of their own damn way, and what is left is an incredibly buggy piece of trash that is virtually unplayable. Tonight, after not being able to play for two weeks straight due to matchmaking bugs and freezing, I managed to play one game. Now I can no longer play anymore. I will be asking for my money back. 

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.

UPDATE: 5 years later, this game is still ass.
Buenisimo

OMG I love this game!!! That said, I am NOT recommending it in hopes that the devs will be more likely to read my review. The matchmaking needs serious work. It was semi-okay for a while. Occasionally you would have a hard time finding a match. You might be kicked out to an empty lobby when trying to join. It seemed to hinge more on how many friends you were playing with. But, since this last Swamp update, finding a game is almost unbearable. I have figured out that if I'm playing by myself, the secret is to select "Survive with Friends" and then close out of the invite option. This puts me with people almost immediately, but I still run a high risk of it hanging up on the map load or just being kicked out during it. I just want to play!!! 

Once you get in a game, it's magically delicious. The devs seem to have knocked out any real way to exploit. You can't communicate while alive (unless you are using a VoIP app), which makes it realistic, and you can't play with friends if one of you is the killer. It's kind of a bummer, but, again, destroys any communication exploits. The dynamics of the game make every match different, so there is no monotony. Again, this game is AWESOME. PLEASE FIX THE MATCHMATCHING.

Великолепная игра для кооперативной работы. Азарт побегать в команде с друзьями от маньяка максимально привлекает внимание игроков. Конечно, неприятно оказаться висящим на крюке и быть закемпленным и затунеленным, но в этом тоже есть определённый шарм. Локации весьма разнообразны и динамичны, а разработчики не сидят на месте и продолжают добавлять новых персонажей и локации. Определённо надо брать!

So, I do recommend the game. Very much so. Because it has a large community and you can get into games generally pretty fast compared to other 4V1 games. I got this for free, and then bought it soon after.

HOWEVER, the DEVS need to seriously get with the program!!!!!!! 
(You can either read the book I posted, or watch this short video.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d31kV-K0cXw&feature=youtu.be

As of this review, I have experience bugs and glitches that have not been fixed despite my game having to update constantly. Usually these "updates" are simply to add some cosmetics to the game or whatever. That urks me. You take time to add that pointless junk, but not prioritize your major issues people are having. IT'S SAYING SOMETHING WHEN YOUR BUG FORUM IS THE SECOND LARGEST FORUM IN YOUR GAME!! It's about 15k posts!!!! COME ON ALREADY!


===THE CONS===
First off, before you buy the game, or test it, be advised that you will get stuck in loading screen loops.. very often.. especially at lower survivor levels. This glitch doesn't seem to appear when you play as killer, despite level. 

Second, there are bug abusers, you will find people able to use weapons that are not intended for the killer they have. Like Nurse is able to use Billy's chainsaw.. this is not intended, but it happens.. and it's very absurd.

Third, your perks will randomize as a survivor.. like.. I place my perks in an order I need them in as a survivor.. so I can see the notifications easier each perk gives as a result.
But despite so many attempts to keep perks at a certain order.. the game will CONSTANTLY randomize them in whatever order it chooses once you enter the match. This throws me off and makes it very difficult to see if the killer is nearby. I want my perks left the way I intended them to be.. not how the glitchfest wanted them to be.

Forth, you will find people with large egos.. you will find killers that will stalk you the entire match, ignoring your comrades that run about them.. 
And some killers on top of this you can't seem to shake off, you can crawl, run, walk, they'll find you. They'll just keep following you around the map and finally if they do catch you, which they normally do, because you can only be chased for so long before it annoys the feces out of you.. they'll camp you, and smack you, when they hook you. Just to add insult to injury.. you WILL run into people like this.

Fifth, you will find players, and experience this yourself, where you bounce around as if lagging.. it's almost like you're losing considerable framerate, and you're in one place at one minute and then at an entirely different place the next minute.. despite your ping being perfectly fine.

Sixth, the DEVS don't seem to want to or even consider making bugs a priority.. some bugs are annoying but can be overlooked, while others are ultimately game breaking.

People have been complaining and complaing.. the bug forums are filled with the stuff I mentioned.. and it doesn't seem like the DEVS even care. 
Eventually people are going to wise up, or ANOTHER GAME is going to be released that has DEVS who actually LISTEN to the COMMUNITY.. but by that time.. it'll be too late for this game and it'll be old news. And when that happens, the DEVS of DbD will have NO ONE to blame but THEMSELVES.

revicemos los pros y contras:
PROS:
-tencion, te hace sentir en la piel de el superviviente 
para sobrevivir nesesitas usar tu vista y tu oido, ademas de que cada tanto sale un skill-check(mientras reparamos un generador o nos curamos,etc) que si hacemos mal alertara al asesino.Por lo que hay que prestar mucha atencion
-como asesino,eras un poco mas rapido que los supervivientes, pero esos pueden saltar a traves de las ventanas y tirar unas maderas para bloquearte el paso,puedes romper las barreras y saltar las ventanas, pero esto llevara un poco de tiempo.
-mapas: cada mapa es diferente y cada uno ofrece mas o menos cobertura, ademas de otros factores
-abilidades: cada superviviente y asesino tiene sus abilidades unicas 
-Banda sonora 
- buenos graficos
-objetos: los supervivientes tienen a su dispocicion objetos que les permitiran cumplir sus objetivos mas rapido, ademas de permitirles curarse, cegar al asesino, etc
-JUEGO:
El objetivo de los 4 supervivientes es activar 5 generadores, para luego abrir la salida y escapar.Si eres el ultimo vivo puedes optar por no activar generadores y escapar por una trampilla.
El asesino deve evitar esto (el puede ver donde estan los generadores) colgando a los supervivientes en ganchos, los cuales pueden ser saboteados por lo que hay que tener cuidado.Generamente se tiene que dar dos golpes a los supervivientes para luego poder colgarlos.

CONTRAS:
-a veces sale una pantalla de carga infinita que solo se soluciona si tocas CTRL+ALT+SUPR
-las animaciones a veces se ven un poco raras, puede que el asesino te este agarrando y parece que el esta agarrando la nada y ytu estas a lado suyo y te levanta una fuerza invisible
-el asesino es el host, lo que significa que puede que juegues lagueado toda la partida, ademas de que hay personas que se ponen a descargar cosas a proposito para laguearte y que asi sea mas facil ganar. Por favor añadan servidores dedicados.PLEASE ADD OFFICIAL SERVERS
-ultimamente estan vendiendo dlc de 6 o 7 dolares donde te da la posivilidad de usar asesinos y supervivientes que otros no pueden usar.Los asesinos de los dlc son mas dificiles de combatir que los normales, busquen en internet algun gameplay de alguien usando a the hag o a michael miers y vean que facil que la tienen
-el emparejamiento: puede que seas nivel 1 y que estes jugando contra un nivel 10, esto nunbca me afecto pero se puede ver que a mucha gente si.
-interminables bugs que afectan la jugabilidad (solo mira en el artwork de la comunidad y veras varias capturas de bugs)

algo que no se si es bueno o malo es el arbol de abilidades, que se genera al azar, pudiendote dar cosas malas mientras que a otro le toco algo impresionante, y los dos son el mismo nivel

Trate de escribir esto de manera objetiva, en el unico lugar que doy mi opinion es respecto a los dlc.No recomiendo este juego, mejor espera a que corrijan los bugs, pongan servidores dedicados y cuando ya este todo eso, compralo en una rebaja por 13 USD.Lo recomiendo si tienes amigos con quie jugarlo.

I saw the hype of this game and also a couple of streamers that i watch played dbd awell so i thought i check the game now out at this time it was a free weekend and i was happy to try it for free. i had really fun and liked it so the free weekend was over and i decided to buy it. at beginning i was scared and try to hide.. i remember that skill check on gens omg... i was so bad to click at the right moment it was so awfull xD but i got a tip that before a skill check comes it will appear a noise so i was prepared to hit in a couple seconds the button^^ i was really happy when i could escape =P i play now over 400 hours and still i enjoy it to play but sadly im not more scared like at the beginning and now you make more fun of the killer then be scared... im more the survivor player i like killer also but im not that good and have no perks hihi but next i push some bloodpoints on someone i hope..^^ its still fun when you play alone but it makes even more fun to play with friends. btw praise the superior dwight now the shiny one ;) i dont understand why people complain over dlc you can glad that the devs not like the others you know wich ones ;) i gladly back up the devs they make a great job also when the bugs not all are fixed^^ also i enjoy theyre thursdays live stream and its funny to watch the producer of dbd matthew cote on stream who plays as killer =P the community well its toxic but not even close like lol ;) 

so i can recommend the game with my 400+ hours ;)
